JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Chef for Chinese Cuisine

We are seeking a passionate and experienced chef specializing in Chinese cuisine to join our dynamic team at YoYo Restaurantionsselskab ApS. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of traditional Chinese cooking techniques and flavor profiles, with the ability to innovate and adapt dishes to suit a modern palate.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Preparation and cooking of a wide variety of traditional and modern Chinese dishes from the restaurant's existing menu.
  • Ensure high quality and consistency in all dishes.
  • Contribute to the development and renewal of the Chinese cuisine menu.
  • Monitor kitchen hygiene and safety standards.
  • Collaborate with the kitchen team to ensure smooth operations.

Qualifications:

  • Minimum 3 years of experience as a chef, specializing in Chinese cuisine.
  • Competence in a variety of Chinese culinary styles, such as Cantonese, Sichuan, or Dongbei gastronomy (Chinese North East).
  • In-depth knowledge of Chinese cooking techniques, ingredients, and flavor combinations.
  • Creativity and innovation in developing new Chinese dishes and menus.
  • Ability to work effectively under pressure in a fast-paced environment.
  • Excellent teamwork skills.
  • Knowledge of food safety and hygiene principles.
  • Chinese language skills are a plus.

We offer:

  • Competitive salary and employment benefits.
  • Opportunities for professional development and advancement.
  • A dynamic and supportive work environment.
  • The opportunity to work with a team of dedicated and talented colleagues.

How to apply:
Send your application, including CV and any references, to Yinhang_yang@hotmail.com. We look forward to hearing from you!
